column4: anyone knows howto make the internet connection run properly? its really not nice to have to reset the router after each reboot...

when i have rebooted ubuntu... my browser cant load webpages... but updating the system over the ubuntu servers is working....
messengers and irc clients dont have connection to the internet either....
then i have to disconnect the connection by the router and reconnect....
hmm can you ping web servers? like say google.com?
after a while it runs...
mostly not...
managed it once ... but he only could ping google.... =)

hmm what does your /etc/resolv.conf say?

thats the ip of the router
is that the address of your router? if so try changing that to your isp's dns server or any dns server really
